item.title: RODIN INCOME TRUST INC 10-K
item.description: RODIN INCOME TRUST INC, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 30, 2022 had 41823 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 929 instances may - 633 instances loan - 419 instances 31 - 376 instances december - 375 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
